verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Jesus saves.
Hallelujah, Jesus saves.
Hallelujah, Jesus saves.
I'm so glad, I'm so glad Jesus saves.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tell your brother, Jesus saves.
Tell your brother, Jesus saves.
Tell your brother, Jesus saves.
I'm so glad, I'm so glad Jesus saves.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tell your sister, Jesus saves.
Tell your sister, Jesus saves.
Tell your sister, Jesus saves.
I'm so glad, I'm so glad Jesus saves.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Aleluya, Cristo salva. (3x)
Soy feliz, si muy feliz, Cristo salva.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Dile al hermano, Cristo salva. (3x)
Soy feliz, si muy feliz, Cristo salva.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Dile a tu hermana, Cristo salva. (3x)
Soy feliz, si muy feliz, Cristo salva.
